## Scientific Signs in the Quran

> - Creation from smoke (41:11)
> - Was joined together (21:30)
> - Created all things between heavens and earth
> - Each body has orbit (21:33, 36:40)
> - Solar apex (36:38)
> - Expansion of universe (51:47)
> - Everything from water (21:30)
